name: Pesticide consumption as a proxy for trend in chemical pollution
description: shipping as a proxy for oil pollution: trend assumed to be zero based on status of 0

description: trash: trend assumed to be zero based on status of 0

name: Habitat extent
description: Modeled combined habitat extent (sea ice extent and shoreline)

description: Modeled combined habitat health trend (sea ice extent and shoreline)

name: Coastal marine protected areas throughout CCAMLR regions and coastal protected areas inland 1km
description: Proportion of protected areas relative to entire ocean ccamlr regions (mpa) and score of 1 for all 1 km inland areas, weighted by relative areas of ccamlr ocean and inland regions

name: Coastal marine protected areas throughout CCAMLR regions and coastal protected areas inland 1km
description: Proportion of protected areas relative to entire ocean ccamlr regions (mpa) and score of 1 for all 1 km inland areas, weighted by relative areas of ccamlr ocean and inland regions

name: Status of krill fisheries (calculated using fisheries method)
description: Calculated using c_cmsy scores and catch data for Euphausia superba

name: Trend of krill fisheries (calculated using fisheries method)
description: Calculated using c_cmsy scores and catch data for Euphausia superba

name: Ocean acidification
description: Modeled distribution of the aragonite saturation state (AAS) of the ocean in pre-industrial (~1870) and modern times (2000-2009) from Halpern et al. 2008

name: Sea level rise
description: Modeled sea level rise after Halpern et al. 2008

name: Sea surface temperature (SST) anomalies
description: Modeled sea level rise after Halpern et al. 2008

name: High bycatch caused by commercial fishing
description: Statistics of destructive commercial fishing practices by 5 different gear types (developed in Halpern et al. 2008)

name: Low bycatch caused by commercial fishing
description: Statistics of least destructive commercial fishing practices by 2 different gear types (developed in Halpern et al. 2008)

name: Trampling
description: Trampling data by tourists and researchers

name: Alien species
description: The number and type of invasive and harmful invasive species in each marine ecoregion

name: Habitat extent * rank, per Coastal Protection habitats
